title: User can see  Reinstate from Inactive List properly in a player's Player History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the transaction has been successfully submitted, 
AND the system creates an entry in Player's Player History in green font. Code = , Description = Reinstated from [transaction short name]. From Org field should also be populated, but not To
custom_steps: WHEN the transaction has been successfully approved
custom_expected: THEN the system will update the entry to be in black font

title: BOC user approving a MJ Reinstate from Inactive List tx will create an entry in the daily transaction bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a MJ Reinstate from Inactive List transaction is approved, reversed, or supprssed
AND a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN on the current Pending Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_expected:
THEN approved will appear as "Reinstated from [Insert Transaction Short Name]" (Ex: Reinstated from Paternity List). If the transaction has Appoint as 26th Man checked, then append "as 26th Man"
AND reversed, if the "approved" bulletin entry is still on the Pending Bulletin, it should be removed
BUT  If it was on a previous Bulletin, then a new entry should be added to the current Pending Daily Transaction Bulletin as "Reinstated from [Insert Transaction Short Name] - Reversed". 
AND if the transaction had Appoint as 26th Man checked, then append "as 26th Man" prior to - Reversed. 
AND when a MJ Reinstate from Inactive List transaction is suppressed, if the "reversed" bulletin entry is still on the Pending Bulletin, it should be removed.

title: Receive error Reinstating MN player from Restricted list between 8/1 and end of MN league season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Reinstate from Inactive List transaction is for a player playing in the minor leagues
AND if yes they system will check that the reinstatement date does not fall on or between August 1st and the end of season (including playoffs) of the Club's season dates.
custom_steps:
WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" 
AND the date is on or between those dates, and the player is not on the Restricted List for a drug violation,
custom_expected:
THEN the error will display "This player cannot be reinstated between 8/1 and the conclusion of the Minor League championship season ([insert end of season date for player's Minor League club])."
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: Receive error Reinstating MN player from certain statuses between 8/1 and end of MN league season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Reinstate from Inactive List transaction is for a player playing in the minor leagues. 
AND if yes , the system will check that the reinstatement date does not fall on or between August 1st and the end of season (including playoffs) of the Club's season dates
custom_steps:
WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
AND if the date is on or between those dates, and the player is not on the Restricted List for a drug violation
custom_expected:
THEN display the error, "This player cannot be reinstated between 8/1 and the conclusion of the Minor League championship season ([insert end of season date for player's Minor League club])."
AND  Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: Receive error if the active or under control limit will be exceeded
custom_preconds: GIVEN the reinstate from Inactive List transaction, will put the relevant Major League Org or Minor League Club over their under control or active roster limits.
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN the error will display, The club [Club name] will exceed the Active List or Under Control limit.
Active Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]
Under Control Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]"
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: Receive error Reinstating a MJ player from the Paternity list before 1 day or after 3 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Reinstate from Inactive List transaction is for a MJ League player currently on the Paternity List.
custom_steps:
WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" 
AND the system will check that there are not fewer than one day or more than three days between the Reinstatement date and the Placement date from the Paternity List transaction
custom_expected: THEN the error will display  "Players cannot be on the Paternity List for less than one day or more than three days."

title: Receive error Reinstating MN player from Temp Inactive list before 3 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Reinstate from Inactive List transaction is for a MN League player currently on the Temporarily Inactive List.
custom_steps:
WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" 
AND the system will check that there are not fewer than three days between the Reinstatement date and the Placement date from the Temporarily Inactive List transaction
AND the current date does not fall outside of the Org's season
custom_expected: THEN display the error "This player cannot be reinstated from the Temporarily Inactive List until [insert date 3 days from the Temporarily Inactive List placement date]."

title: Receive error Reinstating player from Vol Retired list prior to 60 in season days
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Reinstate from Inactive List transaction is for a player currently on the Voluntarily Retired List.
custom_steps:
WHEN  Clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
AND the system will check that there are not fewer than 60 in-season days (using Club's season dates including playoffs) between the Reinstatement date and the Placement date from the Voluntarily Retired List transaction.
custom_expected: THEN display the error "This player cannot be reinstated from the Voluntarily Retired List until [insert date 60 days from the Voluntarily Retired List placement date]."

title: BOC user approving an elect free agency transaction will update the player's information
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN Approving an Elect Free Agency transaction
custom_expected: THEN if the transaction is a free agent transaction, Set the player’s free agent type to the type selected in the transaction.

title: As a user I want "Reason for Placement" required on NES placements
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a NES placement tx
custom_steps: WHEN "Reason for Placement" is required for approval
custom_expected: THEN Field is marked with a red asterisk

title: Error if the player MJ Place on Disqualified List transaction does not have a valid MJ Roster status
custom_preconds: GIVEN the player does not have a pending or actual MJ Roster status of Active, Active Pending Contract or a DL placement (including rehab) .
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting "Place on Disqualified List" from the MJ Create New menu
custom_expected:
THEN the error will display "A Major League player must be Active, Active Pending Contract, or on the Disabled List in order to be placed on an Inactive List."
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue (BOC Only) will proceed with the transaction.

title: BOC user can create a new Place on Ineligible List transaction for a MJ player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting "Place on Ineligible List" from the Create New
custom_expected:
THEN if there is an existing Preliminary MJ Place on Ineligible List transaction for the same player created within 10 days of the current date. 
AND If a preliminary transaction already exists, the system will load the existing transaction in Edit Mode instead of opening a new transaction. 
BUT If no preliminary transaction created within 10 days of the current date exists, the system will load a new Preliminary transaction.

title: BOC user can create a new Place on Ineligible List transaction for a MN player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting "Place on Ineligible List" from the Create New
custom_expected:
THEN if there is an existing Preliminary MN Place on Ineligible List transaction for the same player created within 10 days of the current date. 
AND If a preliminary transaction already exists, the system will load the existing transaction in Edit Mode instead of opening a new transaction. 
BUT If no preliminary transaction created within 10 days of the current date exists, the system will load a new Preliminary transaction.

title: Error when creating a MJ Place on Ineligible List transaction for is not a major league player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the player is not currently playing at the Major League level
custom_steps:
WHEN Selecting "Place on Ineligible List" from the MJ Create New menu
AND is also checked on Approve
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "This transaction is for Major League players only"

title: Error when creating a MN Place on Ineligible List transaction for is not a minor league player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the player is not currently playing at the Minor League level
custom_steps:
WHEN Selecting "Place on Ineligible List" from the MN Create New menu
AND this rule is also checked on Approve
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "This transaction is for Minor League players only"

title: Error when attempting to Reinstate a MN player from the Restricted list between 8/1 and the end of the MN League season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Reinstate from Inactive List transaction is for a player playing in the minor leagues.
AND If yes , the system will check that the reinstatement date does not fall on or between August 1st and the end of season (including playoffs) of the Club's season dates
custom_steps:
WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" 
AND If the date is on or between those dates, and the player is not on the Restricted List for a drug violation
custom_expected:
THEN the error will display "This player cannot be reinstated between 8/1 and the conclusion of the Minor League championship season ([insert end of season date for player's Minor League club])."
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: Error when attempting to Reinstate a MN player from certain statuses between 8/1 and the end of the MN League season
custom_preconds: WHEN  the Reinstate from Inactive List transaction is for a player playing in the minor leagues
custom_steps:
WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
AND If yes, and the player is being reinstated from the Ineligible List, Disqualified List or the Voluntarily Retired List, then the system will check that the reinstatement date does not fall on or between August 1st and the end of season (including playoffs) of the Club's season dates
custom_expected:
THEN the error will display  "This player cannot be reinstated between 8/1 and the conclusion of the Minor League championship season ([insert end of season date for player's Minor League club])."
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: User will receive a warning if the active or under control limit will be exceeded with a reinstate from Inactive List transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has a Inactive List transaction
AND the completion of the tx will put the relevant Major League Org or Minor League Club over their under control or active roster limits
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN the error will display The club [Club name] will exceed the Active List or Under Control limit.
Active Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]
Under Control Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]"

title: Error when attempting to Reinstate a MJ player from the Restricted list between 8/1 and 10/31
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Reinstate from Inactive List transaction is for a MJ League player.
AND If yes , and the player is being Reinstated from the Ineligible List, Disqualified List, Voluntarily Retired List or the Restricted List, the system will check that the reinstatement date does not fall on or between August 1st and October 31st.
custom_steps:
WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
AND If the date is on or between those dates
custom_expected:
THEN the error will display "This player cannot be reinstated between 8/1 and 10/31."
BUT If the player is being Reinstated from the Restricted List and the player is on the Restricted List immediately following a Bereavement List placement, or for a drug violation, then this rule does not apply.

title: Error when attempting to Reinstate a MJ player from the Bereavement list before three days or after seven days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Reinstate from Inactive List transaction is for a MJ League player currently on the Bereavement List.
AND If yes, the system will check that there are not fewer than three days or more than seven days between the Reinstatement date and the Placement date from the Bereavement List transaction.
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN the error will display "Players cannot be on the Bereavement list for fewer than three days or more than seven days."
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue (only available for the BOC) will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.
